body_html:
I've plugged a conv4d equivalent together in python. It's just on python level, so most likely not the fastest, but if you want to start with that you can find it here:
https://github.com/mhuen/TFScripts
If you do decide to give it a try, let me know if you have any suggestions or if you come across any bugs as I haven't extensively tested it yet.

body:
I've plugged a conv4d equivalent together in python. It's just on python level, so most likely not the fastest, but if you want to start with that you can find it here:
https://github.com/mhuen/TFScripts
If you do decide to give it a try, let me know if you have any suggestions or if you come across any bugs as I haven't extensively tested it yet.
